roleset.name: contemplate an action again, evaluating again
roleset.note: REEVALUATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reevaluate' based on transformation of 'evaluate'. No actual examination of the corpus. (from reevaluate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: In a prepared statement from Australia , the company also said that , following the breakdown of the MGM talks , it `` had been re-evaluating its position as a significant shareholder and a substantial creditor of Qintex Entertainment '' and had `` resolved [*-1] to minimize the degree of further loans to Qintex Entertainment in excess of that previously made . ''
example.arg: following the breakdown of the MGM talks
its position as a significant shareholder and a substantial creditor of Qintex Entertainm ent

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: What Nietzsche is showing us is how vital agency is to his reevaluation of values.
